message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $175.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would that be possible?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $100 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to come down to $125, considering your interest in the product.  Let me know if you're able to meet me halfway.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but unfortunately, I cannot go above $100 for the product. Would it be possible for us to meet at that price?
